title: At G7, Trump Renews Embrace of Putin Amid Rift With Allies
summary: Trump Renews Embrace of Putin Amid Rift With Allies at G7 gathering . President Trump criticizes decision to expel Russia after Crimea's 2014 annexation .

title: Flattery or Discipline? The Difficult Task of Managing Trump.
summary: Canada’s prime minister Mark Carney deployed both methods on the first day of the Group of 7 summit in Alberta to keep Mr. Trump focused and avoid drama.

title: Trump’s Cuts to N.I.H. Grants Focused on Minority Groups Are Illegal, Judge Rules
summary: the judge accused the Trump administration of discriminating against racial minorities and L.G.B.T.Q. people . The judge ordered the government to restore much of the funding .

title: 36 More Countries May Be Added to Trump’s Travel Ban
summary: The administration gave the nations 60 days to fix concerns . The president already imposed a full or partial ban on citizens of 19 countries .

title: Trump Mobile Phone Company Announced by President’s Family, but Details Are Murky
summary: Trump Mobile Phone Company Announced by President’s Family, but Details Are Murky . The new company says it will manufacture its Android phone in the United States .
